Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute at 59th/State
ShortDescription: 59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Wabash, 61st Sate, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage nr 59th/State

Headline: #9 Ashland and #X9 Ashland Express Temporary Reroute at Ashland/65th
